rules.name: R2 Types
rules.detail: Datetime index is daily, naive, and monotonic

rules.name: R3 Freshness
rules.detail: Latest date 2025-09-24 within freshness threshold (7 days)

rules.name: R4 Calendar
rules.detail: No missing dates between min and max

rules.name: R6 Range
rules.detail: Revenue, ad_spend, orders, and views are non-negative
